# Introduction

Imtihan (eExam) is a E-Exam framework built on top of the hottest opensource technologies such as Laravel (opens new window), a PHP (opens new window) framework and Next.js (opens new window), a progressive React framework. eExam can help you reduce your time, cost and workforce to build your online course or move from physical courses to the ever-in-demand online world. Your business - whether small or large - can benefit. And setting it up is simple.

Help us improve this page on Github. (opens new window)
